long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension creates a landscape on your screen. It is an extra layer that will make the website harder to read and harder to use but the layer wil react different depending on the website. This work is a reinterpretation of the Litany for the blind from net artist Damon Zucconi and uses emojis to crate a colourful moving sea landscape.
